# Welcolme to **r4Casal2**

This book demonstrates functionality of the `r4Casal2` R package. All functions in this package should be documented and available with the `?` query. For example `?get_fisheries`


```{r install_packages, results = 'hide', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(r4Casal2)
library(Casal2)
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
```
